price: ߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߬ ߝߟߐ ߣߌ߫ ߟߊߓߊ߲ ߣߌ߫ ߞߐߞߊ߲ߠߊ ߣߌ߫ ߞߣߐߟߊ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߬ ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߟߐ߲ߓߊ߯ߓߊ ߘߌ߫
arabic: هُوَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُ وَٱلۡأٓخِرُ وَٱلظَّٰهِرُ وَٱلۡبَاطِنُۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-awalu wal-ākhiru wal-ẓāhiru wal-bāṭinu wahuwa bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
